shortdesc.ph: Occurs each time the SDK receives a video frame and prompts you to set the video format.

section.p: If you want to get video data other than 420 format, you need to register this callback when calling the method. After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame. You need to set your preferred video data in the return value of this callback.

section.title: Returns
section.p:
Set the raw data format output by the SDK:
(0): (default) YUV420 format.
`2`: The format is BGRA.
